%N A050513 a(n) = (-1)^n * Sum_{i=0..n} binomial(n+1,i+1)*prime(i+1).
%t A050513 Table[(-1)^(n-1)*Sum[Binomial[n, k]*Prime[k], {k, 1, n}], {n, 1, 20}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Mar 01 2016 *)
